pages.text: This module behaves like the $(l:modules/dropper)Dropper Module/$, except that it also imparts a configurable velocity to the dropped item, potentially throwing the item a considerable distance. You can adjust the item's speed, pitch and yaw via the module's GUI.$(li)Pitch and Yaw are in degrees, relative to a base pitch or yaw.

$(li)If the module ejects Up or Down, the base pitch is +90째 or -90째, respectively. Otherwise, the base pitch is 0째.$(li)If the module ejects Up or Down, the base yaw is the router's facing direction. Otherwise the base yaw is taken from the module's direction.$(li)Example: a speed of 1.0, pitch/yaw of 0째, and a horizontal module direction, will throw an item along the ground for a distance of about 7 blocks.
